name: Piatto di salumi delizioso
desc: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.

value.text: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

value.name: Ricetta: piatto di salumi
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Cold Cut Platter.

value.name: Prosciutto
value.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

value.name: Pancetta
value.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

value.name: Salsiccia
value.desc: Finely minced meat wrapped in a skin. A staple of every meat lover's daily diet.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Piatto di salumi
value.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.

value.name: Piatto di salumi sospetto
value.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.
